thread.title: Very good family and children friendly place. Spacious suits
thread.title_full: Very good family and children friendly place. Spacious suits - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: dougp565
title: Very good family and children friendly place. Spacious suits
text: Very good family and children friendly place. Spacious suits, we stayed in two bedroom suite. Professional service and staff members. Location centered among many landmarks in London. 3 min walking distance to Buckhimham palace which is really nice. From there you can take hop on and hop off bus. Not located in major shopping or restaurant district but everything is pretty close...
